manipulators.description: Map s-control-tab-l to scroll left
Map s-control-tab-h to scroll right
Map s-control-tab-k to scroll up
Map s-control-tab-j to scroll down
Map q-control-tab-h to move mouse left fast
Map q-control-tab-l to move mouse right fast
Map q-control-tab-k to move mouse up fast
Map q-control-tab-j to move mouse down fast
Map control-tab-h to move mouse left slow
Map control-tab-l to move mouse right slow
Map control-tab-k to move mouse up slow
Map control-tab-j to move mouse down slow
Map control-tab-space to mouse click
Map control-tab-r to right mouse click

rules.description: double right command to switch apps

manipulators.description: Disable Cmd+W in Terminals
Map ^G to ⌘G in Brave/Chrome
Map ^/ to ⌘F in Brave/Chrome
Map ^n to ⌘G in Brave/Chrome
Map ctrl-[ to back in Brave/Chrome
Map ctrl-] to back in Brave/Chrome
Map ctrl-t to new tab in Brave/Chrome
Map ⇧^] to forward in Brave/Chrome
Map ⇧^[ to back in Brave/Chrome
Map ^] to next tab in Brave/Chrome
Map ^[ to previous tab in Brave/Chrome
